name: The Moving Dead
description:
The Moving Dead is a survival game in which you hunt down zombies and crazy animal attackers to collect coins and unlock characters.
Touch and hold your finger, drag to make the characters walk in the direction you want.
There are many types of enemies you can kill: walking zombies, big fat standing zombies that can explode when you get near, crazy ducks, enormous dinosaurs which are really fast and furious, and many others waiting for you to discover. They are the walking dead that you should not let them get close to you!
Note that this game is very bloody so don't download it if you don't want to see a lot of blood!
